title: Julia Ashe // 158
description:
In December of 1989, a 22-year-old woman was doing some Christmas shopping in Connecticut when a “good samaritan” helped change her flat tire, and then she went missing. On Christmas Day, her body was found in an icy pond, and her death was ruled a homicide. This is the story of Julia Ashe.
BONUS EPISODES
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
CASE SOURCES
https://caselaw.findlaw.com/ct-supreme-court/1131986.html

https://www.casemine.com/judgement/us/5914bfa9add7b049347af46d

https://murderpedia.org/male.C/c/cobb-sedrick.htm

https://www.newspapers.com/search/#query=Julia+ashe&p_province=us-ct&dr_year=1989-2021

https://www.newspapers.com/image/242403967/?terms=Julia%20ashe&match=1

https://www.nytimes.com/2003/10/15/nyregion/retrial-hearing-under-way-for-man-sentenced-to-death.html

https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/147320828/julia-m_-ashe

https://reallifevillains.miraheze.org/wiki/Sedrick_Cobb

content:encoded:
In December of 1989, a 22-year-old woman was doing some Christmas shopping in Connecticut when a “good samaritan” helped change her flat tire, and then she went missing. On Christmas Day, her body was found in an icy pond, and her death was ruled a homicide. This is the story of Julia Ashe.

patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
